name: TechCrunch
text:
Dozens of Al Jazeera journalists had their iPhones silently hacked by a "zero-click" exploit to deliver Pegasus, a spyware built by NSO Group. The spyware exploited a bug in iMessage, which Apple has now fixed.

https://t.co/U8c7ph2afX

name: TechCrunch
text:
RT @zackwhittaker: New: Google, Cisco, VMware, and Microsoft have filed an amicus brief in support of WhatsApp's legal case against spyware maker NSO Group, accused of using a zero-day security flaw to hack into 1,400 phones last year.

https://t.co/msncLLU0yJ
